HediffDef.label: Cloth Avali Ear
HediffDef.description: A simple Cloth prosthetic, designed to replace a missing Ear. It's better then nothing.

HediffDef.label: Cybernetic Avali Ear
HediffDef.description: A standard Cybernetic prosthetic, designed to replace a missing Ear. It's slightly better then your original.

HediffDef.label: Bionic Avali Ear
HediffDef.description: An advanced Bionic prosthetic, designed to replace a missing Ear. It's a major upgrade.
